botanicalTraits.name: Phototrophic
botanicalTraits.description: This species is sustained by a combination of both food and sunlight.
effects: Replaces half of the Food upkeep with Energy

botanicalTraits.name: Radiotrophic
botanicalTraits.description: This species is sustained by a combination of both food and low-energy radiation, and as such can thrive on the most inhospitable of worlds.
effects: Replaces half of the Food or Minerals upkeep with Energy
No Energy upkeep on Tomb Worlds

botanicalTraits.name: Budding
botanicalTraits.description: This species is capable of reproduction by budding, in addition to the more usual fertilization of seeds or spores.
effects: +0.02 Monthly Organic Pop Assembly per Pop
